comment: Amazing professor! She grades fairly and is very flexible with deadlines, I definitely recommend her for this class.

Was kind of hands off for most of the class, but it was an online class so I can't be too mad. Consisted of reading short stories and taking quizzes on it. Overall very simple class and very simple teaching style.

Professor Wall is very passionate about literature, and she has a tendency to ramble. She tells you very clearly what to expect for the tests and quizzes. The tests and quizzes were easy to pass the questions were about the author or a characteristic of a character from the text. She uses the textbook a lot throughout the course.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: She repeated herself a lot throughout her classes, so a lot of people zoned out. Prepare to read short stories and for essays. She cares for her students.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Graded by few things

comment: I liked her you just have to stay on top of your studies. Most classes she repeated herself so many people zoned out.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--So many papers

comment: Dr. Wall is a great professor. Everything you need to know about the class is in the syllabus. She doesn't deter too much from it. She gives quizzes pretty much everyday and you must attend class to make a good grade. She is very helpful and hands on when it comes to students. Attempt in her class and she will work with you.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Very straight forward in all of her assignments and graded very fairly. Class was typically 45 minutes and covered the assignments most of the time. She worked with practically anyone who needed accommodations. There was a moderate amount of reading with quizzes on short stories.
Cares for her student, very understanding, if you show up to class and ask questions when you have them you will do well
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR. I dread going to this class everyday. She will ramble on into the very end of class over topics that are discussed numerous times. quizzes are everyday about either a story, poem or a piece of literature.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Great teacher! Would recommend anyone taking her. Shes fair when it comes to grading. Very understanding. Really cares for her students.
She is very helpful and willing to help you learn - A true "teacher". Professor Wall's class was a pleasure to attend.
Good teacher, fair and not too hard. You are mostly writing paper in her class, but its not bad at all. Pretty easy english class.
